skill.name: brand-guidelines
skill.description: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit from having Anthropic's look-and-feel. Use it when brand colors or style guidelines, visual formatting, or company design standards apply.
skill.summary: Applies Anthropic's official brand colors and typography to any sort of artifact that may benefit fr...
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: Official skill from Anthropic. Content is static brand guidance without executable code or external access. No security risks identified.

content.value_statement: Your asset lacks consistent Anthropic branding. This skill applies official colors and typography to align your materials.
actual_capabilities: Provides the official main and accent color palette
Sets Poppins for headings with Arial fallback guidance
Sets Lora for body text with Georgia fallback guidance
Recommends accent color cycling for non text shapes
Guides text color choice based on background contrast
limitations: Does not install fonts or ensure font availability
Does not redesign layouts or create new visuals
Requires artifacts that support text and shape styling
Results depend on the target tool capabilities

use_cases.title: Brand aligned slides
use_cases.description: Apply official colors and typography to presentation decks for consistent visuals.

use_cases.title: Consistent documents
use_cases.description: Align product briefs and proposals with Anthropic brand styling.

use_cases.title: Polished demo assets
use_cases.description: Style demo materials to match Anthropic brand expectations.

prompt_templates.title: Basic styling
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand colors and typography to this document. Use readable text colors on light backgrounds and keep headings distinct.

prompt_templates.title: Slide refresh
prompt_templates.prompt: Style this slide deck using Anthropic colors. Set Poppins for headings, Lora for body text, and rotate accent colors on shapes.

prompt_templates.title: Brand audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the current styling and align it with Anthropic brand guidelines. Update fonts and colors with proper fallbacks.

prompt_templates.title: Multi section layout
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply Anthropic brand styling to each section. Use main colors for backgrounds, accent colors for shapes, and ensure contrast for all text.

output_examples.input: Style my report to match Anthropic brand guidelines.
output: Headings use Poppins with Arial fallback
Body text uses Lora with Georgia fallback
Primary text colors use the Dark and Light palette
Accent shapes cycle Orange, Blue, and Green
Backgrounds use Light Gray and Light tones

best_practices: Install Poppins and Lora fonts before applying styles
Use light backgrounds for text heavy pages
Reserve accent colors for shapes and highlights
anti_patterns: Mixing non brand fonts with the recommended typography
Using accent colors for long body text
Ignoring contrast between text and background

faq.question: Is it compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, the guidance works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code workflows.

faq.question: What are the limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It only provides color and typography guidance, not layout redesign.

faq.question: Can it integrate with existing templates?
faq.answer: Yes, apply the guidance to your current templates and assets.

faq.question: How is my data handled?
faq.answer: The skill content is static and does not transmit or store data.

faq.question: What should I do if fonts are missing?
faq.answer: Use the provided fallbacks: Arial for headings and Georgia for body.

faq.question: How does it compare to general styling tools?
faq.answer: It targets Anthropic brand standards instead of generic themes.
